name: bespoke-nav-touch
description: Adds touch navigation to a Bespoke.js presentation.
readme:
# bespoke-nav-touch

Adds touch navigation to a [Bespoke.js](http://markdalgleish.com/projects/bespoke.js) presentation.

## Usage

This plugin is shipped in a [UMD format](https://github.com/umdjs/umd), meaning it is available as a CommonJS/AMD module or as a browser global.

For example, when using CommonJS modules:

```js
var bespoke = require('bespoke'),
  navtouch = require('bespoke-nav-touch');

bespoke.from('.deck', [
  navtouch()
]);
```

When using browser globals:

```js
bespoke.from('.deck', [
  bespoke.plugins.navtouch()
]);
```

For more information about options and how the plugin works, see the [complete README](https://github.com/opendevise/bespoke-nav-touch/blob/master/README.adoc).

## Credits

This plugin is a fork of the official [bespoke-keys](https://github.com/markdalgleish/bespoke-keys) plugin by Mark Dalgleish. This fork does not interfere with scrolling (see [bespoke-touch#1](https://github.com/markdalgleish/bespoke-touch/issues/1)), has 100% test coverage, provides a cleanup routine and is more clearly named.
